x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/immunizationrecommendation-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/ImmunizationRecommendation \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"ImmunizationRecommendation","id":"d302b5fd-dc97-4c9c-9c52-b442828f52b8","identifier":[{"system":"urn:ietf:rfc:3986","value":"urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.21367.2005.3.7.1235"}],"patient":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"date":"2015-02-10T00:04:15+08:00","authority":{"reference":"Organization/hl7"},"recommendation":[{"vaccineCode":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://snomed.info/sct","code":"14745005","display":"Hepatitis A vaccine"}]}],"forecastStatus":{"text":"Not Complete"},"dateCriterion":[{"code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/immunization-recommendation-date-criterion","code":"earliest","display":"Earliest Date"}]},"value":"2015-12-01T13:00:00+08:00"},{"code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/immunization-recommendation-date-criterion","code":"recommended","display":"Recommended"}]},"value":"2015-12-01T13:00:00+08:00"},{"code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/immunization-recommendation-date-criterion","code":"overdue","display":"Past Due Date"}]},"value":"2016-12-28T13:00:00+08:00"}],"description":"First sequence in protocol","series":"Vaccination Series 1","doseNumberPositiveInt":1,"seriesDosesPositiveInt":3,"supportingImmunization":[{"reference":"Immunization/example"}],"supportingPatientInformation":[{"reference":"Observation/example"}]}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:16.756+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios
javascript Axios
